title: A Graphic Design Opinion on Debonair Ezreal (Suggested Fix)
body:
Im a very keen Lol player and skins are one of the things i love most because as a graphic designer i love visual things 
some skins are absolutely breathtaking and others not so much, but what really makes me sad sometimes is when a really great skin is de-valued by such a minor design choice, the biggest case of this i have noticed is Debonair Ezreal, this skin has a great splash art and a clean and effective in game model, the only problem is the hair, in the splash art he has really well painted golden/orange hair that first well into the colour palette of the skin but his in game model sports his usual bright lemon yellow hair which is kind of an eye sore on the skin as well as the new summoners rift, and contradicts the splash art which is just as annoying for clarity issues. i know the chances of riot changing it are very low but seeming they are already doing great work at the moment upgrading all the old in game models and splash arts i thought it might not be too much of a task to change the colour of the hair on this skin to match the splash art if they deemed it an appropriate change. (TPA Ezreal already has hair colour close to the suggested colour of this skin's hair) so please post your opinions as well to see if you agree with me or if i am alone in my beliefs.

Attached (hopefully if i can work these new boards) is a comparison of the old hair on the bottom of the picture and the alternative i have done on photoshop on the top of the picture.

While i understand from Riots perspective that this isn't a money making venture for them, it does up the value of the skin in general and increase 
in game visual quality.
